mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.line_id AS "serviceLine.id", a.service_mode AS "serviceMode", a.vari_id AS "varietyInfo.id", bvi.name AS "varietyInfo.name", a.service_price AS "servicePrice", a.status AS "delFlag", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate", bsl.order_type AS "serviceLine.orderType", bsl.usable AS "serviceLine.usable", bsl.province_id AS "serviceLine.province.id", prov.name AS "serviceLine.province.name", bsl.city_id AS "serviceLine.city.id", city.name AS "serviceLine.city.name", bsl.region_id AS "serviceLine.region.id", region.name AS "serviceLine.region.name", bsl.to_province_id AS "serviceLine.toProvince.id", tprov.name AS "serviceLine.toProvince.name", bsl.to_city_id AS "serviceLine.toCity.id", tcity.name AS "serviceLine.toCity.name", bsl.to_region_id AS "serviceLine.toRegion.id", tregion.name AS "serviceLine.toRegion.name"

LEFT JOIN biz_variety_info bvi ON bvi.id = a.vari_id LEFT JOIN biz_service_line bsl ON bsl.id = a.line_id LEFT JOIN sys_region prov ON prov.id = bsl.province_id LEFT JOIN sys_region city ON city.id = bsl.city_id LEFT JOIN sys_region region ON region.id = bsl.region_id LEFT JOIN sys_region tprov ON tprov.id = bsl.to_province_id LEFT JOIN sys_region tcity ON tcity.id = bsl.to_city_id LEFT JOIN sys_region tregion ON tregion.id = bsl.to_region_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_service_charge( id, line_id, service_mode, vari_id, service_price, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{serviceLine.id}, #{serviceMode}, #{varietyInfo.id}, #{servicePrice}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_service_charge SET a.line_id = #{serviceLine.id}, service_mode = #{serviceMode}, vari_id = #{varietyInfo.id}, service_price = #{servicePrice}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
